titleStmt.title: Capt. Johnsons last farewel; who was arraigned for being assisting in the stealing a young heiress, for which he received sentance [sic] of death, and was accordingly executed at Tyburn, the 23d. of this instant December, 1690. To the tune of Russel's farewel. Licensed according to order.
titleStmt.author: Johnston, John, Sir, d. 1690.

To the tune of Russel's farewel. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Charles Bates, at the Bible and Sun in Pye-corner.,

Verse: "You noble lords of high degree ..."
